Defines states and possible transitions

TransitionMatrix.Rd

Defines states and possible transitions

Defines states and possible transitions

Public fields

matrix

a binary N x N matrix where matrix[i,j] is 1 if transition from state i to j is possible

states

a character vector of state names (length N)

Methods

Usage
